DOC.brief_summary: Background : Patients hospitalize complex chronic condition frequently experience preventable short-term readmission due inadequate transition support . Although structured discharge plan telephone follow-up improves transition outcomes , service often unavailable , proactive outreach often inadequate patient return home . Informal caregiver invaluable ensure successful transition , many patient live alone , in-home caregiver struggle compete demand , live distance adult child potential source support . New model need transition support include low-cost technology structure assistance patient ' informal caregiving network , provide patient ' clinical team information need avert health crisis . Objectives : Consistent Agency Healthcare Research Quality goal improve transition use accessible health IT , evaluate novel intervention design improve effectiveness transition support common chronic condition via three mechanism action : ( ) direct tailor communication patient via automated call post discharge , ( b ) support informal caregiver via structured feedback patient 's status advice help , ( c ) support proactive care management include web-based disease management tool , automate alert potential problem , capacity asynchronous communication patient caregiver . Specifically , trial determine : 1 ) whether CarePartner intervention improve patient ' readmission risk functional status ; 2 ) impact intervention patient ' self-care behavior quality transition process ; 3 ) whether intervention improve caregiver burden stress level .
DOC.brief_title: Trial CarePartner Program Improving Quality Transition Support
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : 422 adult complex chronic condition identify upon admission university-based acute care general medical service . Patients ask identify CarePartner ( CP ) living outside household ; CPs spouse , adult child , others social network willing play active role transition support . Patients randomize intervention usual care . Intervention patient receive automate assessment behavior change call , CPs receive structure feedback advice follow assessment . Patients ' clinical team access patient ' assessment result via web , receive automate report urgent health problem , able communicate asynchronously patient CPs use secure web page specially design voicemail service . Patients complete survey baseline , 30- 90- day post discharge ; utilization data obtain hospital record . CPs clinicians interview evaluate intervention effect process self-care support , caregiver stress communication , intervention 's potential broad implementation . The primary outcome 30 day readmission rate ; 2ndary outcome include functional status , self-care behavior , mortality risk .
